00050 
00051 bool CHoughProbRHTLine::Initialize(float Ratio, CBinaryImage& Source, int Thickness, 
00052                                    CHoughBase::PARAMETERSPACETYPE SpaceType, CHoughBase::PARAMETERTYPE ParamType)
00053 {
00054         this->PerformSelection(Ratio, Source);
00055         return m_rht_line.Initialize(Source, Thickness, SpaceType, ParamType);
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 bool CHoughProbRHTLine::Initialize(float Ratio, const CStdImage& Source, COLORTYPE Color, UINT8 Threshold, 
00060                                    CHoughBase::ORIGINTYPE OriginType, int Thickness, 
00061                                    CHoughBase::PARAMETERSPACETYPE SpaceType, CHoughBase::PARAMETERTYPE ParamType)
00062 {
00063         CBinaryImage InImage(Source, Color, Threshold, OriginType);
00064         this->PerformSelection(Ratio, InImage);
00065         return m_rht_line.Initialize(InImage, Thickness, SpaceType, ParamType);
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 vector<CParameter2D<float> > CHoughProbRHTLine::PerformTransform(int Threshold, int MaxNumShapes)
00070 {
00071         return m_rht_line.PerformTransform(Threshold, MaxNumShapes);
00072 }
00073 
00074 
00075 void CHoughProbRHTLine::PerformSelection(float Ratio, CBinaryImage& Source)
00076 {
00077         if (0.0f<Ratio && Ratio<=1.0f)
00078         {
00079                 int k = (1.0-Ratio)*Source.GetSize();
00080                 srand( (unsigned) time( NULL ) );
00081                 while (k!=0)
00082                 {
00083                         int pos = Round(1.0*rand()/RAND_MAX*Source.GetSize());
00084                         Source.RemovePixel(pos);
00085                         k--;
00086                 }
00087         }
00088 }
00089 
00090 } // end namespace ipl
